testcase.name: [sut] Prepare SUT: Reset Redis-DB used by rspamd _raw_params=redis-cli -s /var/run/redis/rspamd.sock flushall
[client] client: Send a mail from client to an address SUT is responsible for _raw_params=echo "Test-Body" | mailx -s "Test" erika.m@myotherdomain.test
testcase.system-out: { "ansible_facts": { "discovered_interpreter_python": "/usr/bin/python" }, "changed": true, "cmd": "echo \"Test-Body\" | mailx -s \"Test\" erika.m@myotherdomain.test\n", "delta": "0:00:00.023284", "end": "2020-04-19 23:42:20.106919", "rc": 0, "start": "2020-04-19 23:42:20.083635", "stderr": "", "stderr_lines": [], "stdout": "", "stdout_lines": [], "warnings": [ "Platform linux on host client is using the discovered Python interpreter at /usr/bin/python, but future installation of another Python interpreter could change this.
